testcase.name: SC1- User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to register page.......................................passed When user enters "TESTER4", "ROBOT4", "test77@example.com", "pa@@@ssword" in register inputs.passed And user clicks enter button................................................passed Then check for valid register message.......................................passed

testcase.name: SC2- User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enters valid email "test77@example.com" and password "pa@@@ssword".passed Then check if logged in.....................................................passed

testcase.name: SC3- User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given logged user "test77@example.com" "pa@@@ssword" navigates to change password page.passed When user enters old password "pa@@@ssword" and new password "password".....passed Then check for valid password change flash message..........................passed
